title: Montana Attorney General Tim Fox announces campaign for governor
author: : MTN News
description: Attorney General Tim Fox on Thursday became the second prominent Republican to enter Montana 2020 race for governor.

title: State Senator Al Olszewski Announces Run for Governor - Flathead Beacon
author: Associated Press // Apr 3, 2019
description: Republican state Sen. Al Olszewski on Wednesday announced his candidacy for governor of Montana in 2020, joining a field that includes two statewide elected officials. The orthopedic surgeon... more

title: Gianforte files to run for governor in 2020
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: U.S. Rep. Greg Gianforte filed paperwork Thursday to run for governor in 2020, confirming long-circulated rumors that the congressman would again seek the seat he campaigned for in 2016.

title: At GOP convention in Helena, Gianforte goes ‘all in’ for governor
author: Charles Johnson
description: Republican candidates seeking office across Montana made their opening arguments to party faithful in Helena.

title: Lt. Gov. Mike Cooney to announce run for governor Wednesday
author: DAVID McCUMBER david.mccumbermtstandard.com
description: Lt. Gov. Mike Cooney will run for governor.

title: Whitney Williams Announces Run For Governor
author: Corin Cates-Carney
description: Missoula businesswoman and philanthropist Whitney Williams announced Thursday she’s running for governor. She’s the fourth Democrat to enter the race .

title: Casey Schreiner Joins Race For Governor
author: MTPR News
description: A second Montana Democrat has announced a run for the governor’s seat. State House Minority Leader Casey Schreiner of Great Falls announced his bid in an

title: Former Democratic legislator to run for Montana governor
author: Associated Press
description: The first Democratic candidate for Montana governor has filed her paperwork with state regulators.

title: Sen. Steve Daines talks about compromise bill, 2020 run for re-election on Montana this Morning
author: : Victoria Hill
description: Sen. Steve Daines stopped by Montana this Morning on Friday to discuss President Trump’s plans for the spending bill, the Land and Water Conservation Fund, his planned trip to eastern Montana, and his run for re-election in 2020.

title: Helena Mayor Wilmot Collins announces 2020 bid for US Senate
author: MICHAEL WOODEL michael.woodelhelenair.com
description: Helena Mayor Wilmot Collins announced Monday that he will seek the Democratic nomination for U.S. Senate next fall, becoming the first to challenge incumbent Republican Sen. Steve Daines.

title: Democrat John Mues joins U.S. Senate race
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: John Mues, a Navy veteran and engineer who works in the energy field, announced Thursday he’s running for U.S. Senate in 2020.

title: Democrat Cora Neumann announces for U.S. Senate
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: A woman who started an organization to tap the power of First Ladies around the world and has spent most of her career working on public health issues said Tuesday

title: Stapleton changes lanes, candidates make case for gubernatorial runs
author: Charles Johnson
description: Attorney General Tim Fox touts support for Trump’s wall, State Sen. Al Olszewski calls for a united Republican Party, and State Auditor Matt Rosendale mum on 2020 plans.

title: Rosendale running for Montana’s US House seat in 2020
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: State Auditor Matt Rosendale, a Republican, said Monday he’s running for Montana’s open U.S. House seat.

title: Lewis and Clark County Republican leader enters Montana US House race
author: Associated Press
description: A third Republican has filed to run for Montana’s U.S. House seat left open by Rep. Greg Gianforte’s decision to run governor.

title: Democrat Kathleen Williams takes another run at Montana’s lone U.S. House seat
author: Tom Lutey
description: Kathleen Williams on Friday launched her 2020 campaign for Montana’s lone U.S. House seat, just five months after falling short of defeating incumbent Republican Rep. Greg Gianforte.

title: Missoula state Rep. Tom Winter announces bid for U.S. House
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: State Rep. Tom Winter, a Democrat from Missoula, is running for Montana’s sole seat in the U.S. House in 2020.

title: Bennion announces bid for Montana attorney general in 2020
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: Jon Bennion, Montana’s deputy attorney general, announced Thursday he’s running for attorney general in 2020.

title: Rep Kimberly Dudik Announces Bid For Attorney General’s Office
author: Corin Cates-Carney
description: Missoula attorney and Democratic State Representative Kimberly Dudik says she’s running to be Montana’s attorney general in 2020. Current Republican

title: Great Falls native Graybill announces run for attorney general
author: Karl Puckett
description: Raph Graybill, Gov. Steve Bullock’s top attorney, said Sunday he plans to run for attorney general next year.

title: Austin Knudsen Enters The Race For Montana Attorney General
author: Corin Cates-Carney
description: Former Speaker of the House Austin Knudsen announced Monday that he is seeking the Republican nomination for Montana’s Attorney General race in 2020.

title: Sen. Scott Sales Enters Race For Montana Secretary Of State
author: Corin Cates-Carney
description: Senate President Scott Sales announced today that he is running for the office of Secretary of State in 2020. The Republican from Bozeman is the first

title: State Sen. Bryce Bennett running for Montana secretary of state
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: State Sen. Bryce Bennett, a Democrat from Missoula, announced Wednesday he’s running in the 2020 election to be secretary of state.

title: Rep. Forrest Mandeville running for Montana secretary of state
author: Associated Press
description: State Rep. Forrest Mandeville of Columbus is seeking the Republican nomination for secretary of state.

title: Bowen Greenwood Enters Race For Montana Secretary Of State
author: Corin Cates-Carney
description: A fourth Republican is entering Montana’s primary race for Secretary of State. Bowen Greenwood , current clerk of the Montana Supreme Court, announced

title: Montana superintendent Elsie Arntzen, six weeks in
author: CHELSEA DAVIS chelsea.davismissoulian.com
description: MISSOULA -- How Elsie Arntzen is approaching her new role as Montana’s superintendent of public instruction doesn’t stray too far from other education heads in the region, but her unwillingness

title: Romano to take another run at top education job in 2020
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: Melissa Romano, a Helena Democrat who ran unsuccessfully for the superintendent of public instruction position in 2016, is seeking the job again in 2020, she announced in a press release

title: Republican Downing announces run for Montana state auditor
author: The Associated Press
description: Republican Troy Downing says he’ll run for the open state auditor’s office now that the incumbent, Matt Rosendale, is campaigning for U. S. House. Downing made the announcement Wednesday in a Facebook post . It’s the 52-year-old military veteran’s second campaign for office after unsuccessfully seek…

title: Nicol enters 2020 race for Montana state auditor
author: Phil Drake
description: Billings resident Nelly Nicol announced Thursday that she is running as a Republican in the 2020 election for Montana state auditor.

title: Missoula Democrat Shane Morigeau running for state auditor post
author: HOLLY K. MICHELS holly.michelslee.net
description: State Rep. Shane Morigeau announced Sunday he is running for state auditor in 2020.
